tool_description: With this information the goal is to make information about racing more widely available
name: WonderboyAPI
title: WonderboyAPI

api_list.name: All Belgian Races
api_list.description: At this endpoint nothing happens for now
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wonderboyapi.p.rapidapi.com/belgianraces"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wonderboyapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Date and Time of last update
api_list.description: With this endpoint you can retrieve the Date and Time of the last update
